Mod0_Description: {c_important}Flame Shield{/c} grants {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%+|]{/c} Movement Speed while active.
Mod1_Description: You gain {c_number}[{SF_11} * 100|%|]{/c} Mana Cost Reduction while {c_important}Flame Shield{/c} is active.
Mod4_Description: {c_important}Flame Shield{/c} Heals you for {c_number}[{SF_12} * 100|%|]{/c} of your missing Life.
desc:
{c_label}Cooldown:{/c} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}[{Combat_Effect_Chance_Script_Formula_Override:17}|%|]{/c}
{/if}Engulf yourself in flames for {c_number}{buffduration:FLAMESHIELD_BUFF}{/c} seconds, Burning surrounding enemies for {c_number}{payload:AOE_DAMAGE}{/c} damage per second.

While {c_important}Flame Shield{/c} is active, you are {c_important}{u}Immune{/u}{/c}.
name: Flame Shield
